snippet: Iran created a sensation at the world championships in Poland by upsetting the United States, 3 sets to 2, in preliminary-round play.
abstract: Sports Roundup; Iran upsets United States, 3 sets to 2, in preliminary-round play at the volleyball world championships.
lead_paragraph: Iran created a sensation at the world championships in Poland by upsetting the United States, 3 sets to 2, in preliminary-round play.
